name: Disdoored
description: Disdoored - is the game about survival in a crazy and 100% hand-made plasticine world. Develop your farm, breed new domestic animal species, search for ancient technologies or defend your base from monsters. This world HAS to be disdoored!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 or AMD FX-6300 with at least 2 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 560/Radeon HD 6850 1.5Gb DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (SP1), Windows 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 or AMD FX-8350 with at least 2,5 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce 760/Radeon HD 6970 2Gb DirectX: Version 11 Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 2 GB available space
